level.heading: RESPONSIBILITIES OF INCLUSIONARY UNIT OWNERS (ยง 14-2217) Annually on the anniversary of the closing date for an Inclusionary Unit, thewner of a For Sale Inclusionary Unit shall submit to the Department of Housingnd Community Development certification that it continues to occupy the unit asts principal residence. The certification shall be submitted on or with suchorm as may be prescribed by the Department of Housing and Communityevelopment.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 3907 (May 15, 2009); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 9295, 9316 (December 11, 2009).
